channel.title: europas on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in europas on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Multiple LouderVoice Updates
item.description: It’s been a busy few weeks. Two years after LouderVoice launched with the aim to make reviews more useful via Microformats, Google announced support, followed quickly by several of our competitors. What took ye so long? Then we launched Ireland’s first Google Android Mobile application Then we enabled the use of simple #review to identify mini-reviews on Twitter Then Krishna De of Biz Growth Newsreleased an extended interview with CEO Conor all about ratings and reviews.
